name: Swarm of Compsognathus
description: A swarm of small, agile Compsognathus that can effectively camouflage in grass, moving quickly and quietly.
memorable: The ability to ambush foes using its Grasslands Camouflage while remaining immune to several conditions makes it a persistent threat.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and overpower them through sheer numbers.
relations: Often found in packs, typically encountered in environments rich in vegetation.
environment: Grasslands and other areas with tall grass or shrubbery.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, with immunity to many conditions, allowing for high mobility.
weaknesses: Very low strength and intelligence, limiting effectiveness in direct confrontations.
attacks: Can perform a Bite attack that deals significant piercing damage, especially if the swarm is at full hit points.
most_powerful_ability: Grasslands Camouflage allows for effective hiding and ambushing.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 12, allowing it to notice its surroundings fairly well.
skills: Has notable stealth proficiency with a +6 bonus, enabling effective hiding.
additional_information: Can occupy another creature's space due to its swarm nature.
Damage reduced when hit points fall below half.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points during combat.
